title: Ride.the.Pink.Horse.1947.1080p.Criterion.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM
description:
Ride.the.Pink.Horse.1947.1080p.Criterion.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM

=======

A  tough-talking former GI comes to a small New Mexico town to shake
down a gangster who killed his best friend; things quickly turn nasty.

Robert Montgomery directs and stars in this striking crime drama based
on a novel by Dorothy B. Hughes.

With its relentless pace, expressive cinematography and punchy, clever
script, this is an overlooked treasure from the heyday of 1940s film noir.

=======

Encoded from the Criterion blu-ray release.
Includes audio commentary track with Alain Silver and James Ursini.
Subtitles are English for the English sections and Spanish for the Spanish sections.
Bizarre, kind of defeats the purpose, no?.
